name: Flash Backs
description:
Flash Backs are my 1st 5 Flash games saved as .exe files!

Games were made between 2005 - 2007!

Games are:

1st - Get Right Church - Christian Pac-Man Clone

2nd - Chemistry Whiz - Educational Chemistry Quiz  Game

3rd - Periodic Breakout - Educational Breakout Clone using Periodic Table of Elements

4th - OOE Matching Challenge - Matching Game starring Gospel Recording Artists Out of Eden

5th - Crunch in the Night - Doritios Themed Gallery Shooting Game
